result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on January 20, 2023 at 11:15 am.

9:34 AM  Defendant Kristin Grace Davis appeared by video from Winnebago Mental Health.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Kristin Grace Davis.  Prosecuting attorney Aleksandra Hodowany in court for the State of Wisconsin.   Court reviews events in file, questions where matter is at.  Atty Viel requests a status in 90 days.  State has no objection.  Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for January 20, 2023 at 11:15 am.
for DEF
Transcript of Preliminary Hearing - June 24, 2022
Status conference on October 24, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:19 AM  Defendant Kristin Grace Davis in court.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Kristin Grace Davis.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.   Court reviews events in file.  Defense waives reading of Information and enters not guilty plea. Atty Viel requests a status in 90 days.  State has no objection.  Bond remains in effect.
STC scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Arraignment on July 28, 2022 at 10:15 am.

1:33 PM  Prosecuting attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kristin Grace Anderson Davis in court.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Kristin Grace Anderson Davis.  Officer John Hajny sworn, testifies. Cross by Atty Viel.  Redirect.  Court finds probable cause that felony was committed and probable cause that defendant committed that felony and binds over for further proceedings.  Atty Viel requests an arraignment date be set 30 days out.  State has no objection.  Bond remains in effect.
Arraignment scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Preliminary hearing on June 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Cash bond paid by Scott Davis.
Appeared in court 6/2/22.
Court increases cash bond to $500.  All other conditions apply as previously set.

1:18 PM Defendant Kristin Grace Anderson appeared by video from the Door County Jail.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Kristin Grace Anderson.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Court reviews events in file. Atty Viel  unable to speak with defendant so unsure why didn't appear for prelim.  State requests cash bond be increased.  Defense objects.  Court grants states request, increases cash bond.  JA Pamela Parks will reschedule prelim.
Return on warrant on June 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

11:04 AM   Defendant Kristin Grace Anderson not in court.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Kristin Grace Anderson.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews events in file, questions Atty Viel on defendant's whereabouts.  Atty Viel has no information on defendant's whereabout, indicates defendant was present when this hearing was set.  State requests bench warrant.  Court orders bench warrant (statewide).

Court lifts Pre-Trial Release Monitoring Program Requirement (drug patch)  Conditions of Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then take only in the amount and frequency prescribed and Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia remain in effect.

10:36 AM Defendant Kristin Grace Anderson in court.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Kristin Grace Anderson.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews events in file, questions where matter is at.  Atty Viel requests matter be set for a preliminary hearing.  Atty Viel requests drug patch condition be moved as a condition of bond, provides court with medical documentation for Court to review.  State questions authenticity of that letter, very different than last letter received from defense.  Atty Viel responds.  Court makes statement, removes PTR - drug patch as condition of bond.  All other conditions of bond remain in effect as previously set.  Court will seal medical letter from Bellinhealth.
Preliminary hearing on June 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on April 18, 2022 at 10:30 am.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: 9:34 AM Defendant Kristin Grace Anderson appeared in court, Attorney Shannon Viel for Kristin Grace Anderson appeared in court,  Prosecuting attorney Nicholas Paul Grode appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court questions where matter is at. Atty Viel requests a substitution of Judge, inquires if motion in writing is needed. Court indicates arraignment has not take place yet, will accept request during hearing, grants request, Judge will be reassigned. Bond remains in effect.
Proposed Order to Modify Bond
Cash bond paid by Kristin Anderson
Letter from Bellin Health in regards to allergy to adhesive from drug patch.

Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release. Drug Monitoring. Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then take only in the amount and frequency prescribed. Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.
Converted to a cash bond.

1:13 PM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Kristin Grace Anderson appeared in court, Attorney Shannon Viel appeared in court for Kristin Grace Anderson. Court addresses motion for bond modification. State requests bond be amended from signature to cash bond. Defense requests the bond not be amended to cash, drug monitoring be removed, due to allergic reaction. State objects. Court grants States request, amends bond to cash bond.
Bail/bond hearing on March 8, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Proposed Order to Modify Bond - Anderson, Kristin Grace
Motion to Modify Bond Kristin Anderson
State's Discovery Demand

Court lifts Pretrial Monitoring - Drug Monitoring. Defendant will have patch removed on 2/17/22.  Patch to be reapplied immediately upon release of treatment facility.  All other conditions remain the same as previously set.

1:27 PM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Kristin Grace Anderson not in court, Attorney Shannon Viel appeared in court for Kristin Grace Anderson. Defense requesting defendant be removed from Pretrial monitoring - Drug monitoring, while she attends treatment. Court grants request.  Defendant is to have drug monitoring removed on 2/17/22, day admitted to treatment, also sign bond form at that time. Defendant to be put back on drug monitoring, immediately upon release from treatment.  Court will reassess drug monitoring at 3/21/22 court date.  Bond remains in effect.
Bail/Bond Review scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Defendant fingerprinted on 1/26/22.

Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release. Drug Monitoring.  Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then take only in the amount and frequency prescribed. Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.
